games.name: Sworn
games.description: Edit currencies and resources for your Sworn save files

platforms.name: Steam
platforms.instructions:
Put the following into your file explorer to go straight to the Save Game folder, then click on the folder with your Steam ID:
%USERPROFILE%\AppData\LocalLow\Windwalk Games\SWORN\data\. Drag the latest file named: savegame_12345678.dat into this editor to begin
platforms.notes: Always create a backup of your save file before editing. The save file is named with your Steam ID followed by a number.

games.name: Megabonk
games.description: Edit currencies, characters, achievements, and shop items for your Megabonk save files

platforms.name: Steam
platforms.instructions:
Put the following into your file explorer to go straight to the Save Game folder, click on the folder with your Steam ID:
%USERPROFILE%\AppData\LocalLow\Ved\Megabonk\Saves\CloudDir\. Drag the file named: progression.json into this editor to begin
platforms.notes: Always create a backup of your save file before editing. The save file is encrypted with AES-256-CBC encryption.

games.name: Cloverpit
games.description: Comprehensive editor for Cloverpit GameDataFull.json with full control over economy, spins, RNG, powerups, and more

platforms.name: Steam
platforms.instructions:
Windows: %USERPROFILE%\AppData\LocalLow\Panik\CloverPit\SaveData\GameData\
Or Steam: <SteamLibrary>\steamapps\common\CloverPit\SaveData\GameData\

Look for GameDataFull.json and drag it into this editor.
platforms.notes: Always create a backup of your save file before editing. This file is encrypted with a custom XOR cipher. The editor handles encryption/decryption automatically.
